mapper.select: select dd.id as id, dd.org_id as orgId, org.name as orgName, d.id as duty_id, d.type_id as duty_type_id, dt.name as duty_type_name, d.name as duty_name, ds.id as shift_id, ds.begin_time as shift_begin_time, ds.end_time as shift_end_time, di.id as item_id, di.item_type_id as item_type_id, case di.item_type_id when 1 then '车辆' when 2 then '警员' when 3 then '武器' when 4 then '定位设备' when 999 then '自定义' end as item_type, case di.item_type_id when 1 then veh.number when 2 then poc.name when 3 then wpo.number when 4 then gps.number when 999 then di.ud_name end as item_displayname, di.ud_name as item_ud_name, di.parent_id as item_parent_id, di.is_leaf as item_is_leaf, di.level as item_level, di.full_id_path as item_full_id_path from t_duty_desc as dd left join t_duty as d on dd.id=d.duty_desc_id left join t_duty_shift as ds on d.id=ds.duty_id left join t_duty_item as di on ds.id=di.duty_shift_id left join organ as org on dd.org_id=org.id left join t_duty_type as dt on d.type_id=dt.id left join t_vehicle as veh on di.item_type_id=1 and di.item_id=veh.id left join t_police as poc on di.item_type_id=2 and di.item_id=poc.id left join t_weapon as wpo on di.item_type_id=3 and di.item_id=wpo.id left join t_gps as gps on di.item_type_id=4 and di.item_id=gps.id where dd.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by d.id,ds.id,di.id
